Guidelines/2021 Policy No_ 18.76/2021 dated 31st December _ 2021 (Decision taken on e-office file No. NHAI/ APPROVALOFVariationofNashritoRambanMaintenance Comp. No_ 114182) Sub: Maintenances of Stretches- reg: Please refer to NHAI   Policy No 18.37/2019 dated 09.12.2019;  Policy No 18.38/2020 dated 07.02.2020 Policy No 18.39/2020 dated 12.03.2020; Policy No 18.41/2020 dated 15.04.2020 and other applicable policies in respect to maintenance of stretches. 2_ It is observed that in some cases, proposals are sent to NHAI HQ for post facto approval of Competent Authority on Variation of BOQ Quantities or Variation of Non BOQ items: This practice should be discouraged with immediate effect and all the concerned are hereby directed to sanction / approval prior to work allocation and seek timely approval of NHAI HQ on Variation, if any: 3 This issues with the approval of the Competent Authority. 34/2/wo1 / (Sanjay Kumar Patel) General Manager (Coord.) To: All Officers of NHAI HQ/ ROs/ PIUs/ CMUs/ Site Offices to: 1_ Hindi Officer for translation in Hindi. 2. Library for hosting the circular o library site. 3 . Web Admin for circulation.
